name: 07 Zglos Sie
overview: 07 Zglos Sie is a Polish language homebrew public domain selectable answers graphic text adventure for the Atari 8-Bit line of computers developed by a group called AtariOnline.pl and published by Retronics in 2017. 07 Zgłoś Się is an unofficial freeware port of ZX Spectrum version, released back in 1993. The gameplay and story remains unchanged, all graphics have been drawn from scratch, modeled on the original version.
